meanings.definition: To eat food enthusiastically or greedily.
meanings.sent1: She noshes on popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: He always noshes on chips when he's studying.
meanings.sent3: The puppy noshes on his treats with delight.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel noshes on nuts like there's no tomorrow.
meanings.sent5: The kids nosh on candy at the birthday party.

meanings.sent1: I grabbed a quick nosh before heading out.
meanings.sent2: She packed a healthy nosh for her afternoon break.
meanings.sent3: The office always has a variety of noshes in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The picnic basket was filled with delicious noshes.
meanings.sent5: The food truck offered tasty noshes for lunch.
